author: Richard Eldred
description:
Across the UK, tenant farmers are being turfed off prime land as a solar gold rush – fuelled by Net Zero targets and fat subsidies – puts energy profits ahead of food, jobs and local livelihoods.

The post Farmers Turfed off Prime Land As Net Zero Gold Rush Grips Landowners appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Farmers Turfed off Prime Land As Net Zero Gold Rush Grips Landowners

author: Richard Eldred
description:
Sadiq Khan's been accused of launching a fresh war on drivers after a leaked TfL doc revealed plans for pricier permits, fewer parking spaces and more 20mph zones across London.

The post Leaked TfL Documents Reveal Sadiq Khan’s New ‘War on Motorists’ appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Leaked TfL Documents Reveal Sadiq Khan’s New ‘War on Motorists’

author: Richard Eldred
description:
Rotherham Man who threatened Muslims with social ostracisation if they cooperated with South Yorkshire Police’s inquiries into the grooming gangs has been awarded an MBE for “services to integration” and “cohesion”.

The post Man Who Threatened Muslims With a ‘Boycott’ if They Cooperated With South Yorkshire Police’s Inquiries Into Rotherham’s Grooming Gangs Given MBE for Promoting ‘Integration’ and ‘cohesion’ appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Man Who Threatened Muslims With a ‘Boycott’ if They Cooperated With South Yorkshire Police’s Inquiries Into Rotherham’s Grooming Gangs Given MBE for Promoting ‘Integration’ and ‘cohesion’

author: Richard Eldred
description:
Why are taxpayers being forced to spunk money on nonsense like "breastfeeding men" and other pointless projects, while women's rights and common sense are ignored? asks Gillian Bowditch in the Sunday Times.

The post Why Are We Funding ‘Breastfeeding Men’? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why Are We Funding ‘Breastfeeding Men’?

author: Richard Eldred
description:
With free speech on shaky ground and censorship creeping back in, Britain risks sliding back to a time when speaking out was dangerous and thought crimes were punished, warns Robert Tombs in the Telegraph.

The post Britain’s War on Free Speech Echoes Its Darkest Past appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Britain’s War on Free Speech Echoes Its Darkest Past

author: Laurie Wastell
description:
For decades men's sperm counts have been in precipitous decline. By 2050 they will be effectively zero and reproduction may become impossible, Dr Charles Cornish-Dale tells Laurie Wastell.

The post Dr Charles Cornish-Dale: “Reproduction May Become Impossible” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Dr Charles Cornish-Dale: “Reproduction May Become Impossible”

author: Tilak Doshi
description:
Greens in Germany are demanding price controls on ice cream so poor kids can afford the treat made unaffordable by their own disastrous energy policies. You can't make this up, says Dr Tilak Doshi.

The post German Greens Demand Price Controls on Ice Cream Because Their Own Policies Have Made it Unaffordable appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: German Greens Demand Price Controls on Ice Cream Because Their Own Policies Have Made it Unaffordable
